verbs.description: i [V: may] be wrong again blocked on fb for posting wwii anti - nazi photos and quotes during the 800 site purge a few weeks ago i was swept up and had some of my posts blocked a few weeks earlier i was blocked for 30 days for violating community standards i never got it clear why but i do post some strongly anti - gop or book lovers kos liberation league brett kavanaugh senate facebook senator kos kos media gop texas dmca
